Update an existent Review.

Example

Update the review with id 1.

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X PUT -d \ '{ "title": "Awesome Place to party!!", "positiveComments": "The environment is awesome!", "negativeComments": "Hard to enter!", "scores": { "pricing": 10, "location": 0, "atmosphere": 5, "safety": 1, "service": 10, "musicAndLineup": 10 } }' \ https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/reviews/1.json?token=userToken

NOTE: Only the user who created the review are allowed to update the review.
